content: Just got back from Tokyo, and the blend of tradition and tech there is something else. It's got me thinking about how we can integrate $XVI into urban living in NYC, making everyday life a bit more seamless. Time to catch up with Sam and brainstorm.", type='text')]

Just had an enlightening chat with Sofia, an urban artist from Barcelona, about how tech can amplify traditional art forms. We're brainstorming ways $XVI could enable a global art exchange platform where artists can showcase their work with augmented reality. Time to sketch out some concepts with her.", type='text')]
